snippet: Axe, the Unilever brand, has so far been pitched at young men, with ads depicting women smelling Axe users and aggressively pursuing them.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column highlights campaign by Unilever's Axe brand for its new fragrance Anarchy, being marketed in different versions for men and women.
lead_paragraph: Axe, the Unilever brand, has so far been pitched at young men, with ads depicting women smelling Axe users and aggressively pursuing them.

headline.seo: Axe Adds Fragrance for Women to Its Lineup
headline.main: Axe Adds Fragrance for Women to Its Lineup
headline.print_headline: Axe Adds Fragrance For Women To Its Lineup
